itemtemplate.name: Cutting %name%
itemtemplate.text: Damage from this sword is psychic damage instead of the weapon's usual damage type. A creature damaged by this sword must make a DC 12 wisdom saving throw or suffer 1 random type of short term madness until the end of the target's next turn.

itemtemplate.name: Steeleaf %name%
itemtemplate.text:
The blade of this weapon is made from steeleaf, a magical material from the feywild. Grown on special trees, it is as light as a leaf but as sharp as steel. This weapon has the finesse property, and you gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon. Attacking with this weapon while hidden does not reveal your position if the attack misses.
Finesse: When making an attack with a finesse weapon, you use your choice of your Strength or Dexterity modifier for the attack and damage rolls. You must use the same modifier for both rolls.
